014package org.gbif.api.vocabulary;
015
016import org.gbif.api.util.IdentifierUtils;
017import org.gbif.api.util.VocabularyUtils;
018
019import java.util.Arrays;
020import java.util.Collections;
021import java.util.List;
022
023import jakarta.annotation.Nullable;
024
025import org.apache.commons.lang3.StringUtils;
026
027/**
028 * Enumeration for all possible identifier types.
029 */
030public enum IdentifierType {
031
032  URL,
033
034  /**
035   * Reference controlled by a separate system, used for example by DOI.
036   * {http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Handle_(computing)}
037   */
038  LSID,
039
040  HANDLER,
041
042  DOI,
043
044  UUID,
045
046  FTP,
047
048  URI,
049
050  UNKNOWN,
051
052  /**
053   * Indicates the identifier originated from an auto_increment column in the portal.data_provider or
054   * portal.data_resource table respectively.
055   */
056  GBIF_PORTAL,
057
058  /**
059   * Identifies the node (e.g: 'DK' for Denmark, 'sp2000' for Species 2000).
060   */
061  GBIF_NODE,
062
063  /**
064   * Participant identifier from the GBIF Directory.
065   */
066  GBIF_PARTICIPANT,
067
068  /**
069   * ID migrated from GrSciColl.
070   */
071  GRSCICOLL_ID,
072
073  /**
074   * Cool URI migrated from GrSciColl.
075   */
076  GRSCICOLL_URI,
077
078  /**
079   * IRN of an IH record.
080   */
081  IH_IRN,
082
083  /**
084   * Research Organization Registry.
085   * https://ror.org
086   */
087  ROR,
088
089  /**
090   * https://www.grid.ac/institutes/
091   */
092  GRID,
093
094  /**
095   * https://cites.org/
096   */
097  CITES,
098  /**
099   * Symbiota IDs to help linking GrSciColl occurrences.
100   */
101  SYMBIOTA_UUID,
102  WIKIDATA,
103
104  /**
105   * https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/
106   */
107  NCBI_BIOCOLLECTION,
108
109  /**
110   * https://slks.dk/english/work-areas/libraries-and-literature/library-standards/isil
111   */
112  ISIL,
113
114  /**
115   * ChecklistBank dataset keys (integer)
116   * https://www.checklistbank.org/dataset
117   */
118  CLB_DATASET_KEY,
119
120  /*
121   * RNC Colombia Identifiers
122   */
123  RNC_COLOMBIA;
124
125  // TODO: Check if this is used, it didn't exist in the new Registry2 API, but I preserved it from the old vocabulary
126  public static final List<IdentifierType> TYPES;
127
128  static {
129    TYPES = Collections.unmodifiableList(Arrays.asList(IdentifierType.values()));
130  }
131
132  /**
133   * @return the matching IdentifierType or null
134   */
135  public static IdentifierType fromString(String identifierType) {
136    return VocabularyUtils.lookupEnum(identifierType, IdentifierType.class);
137  }
138
139  /**
140   * Tries to infer the identifier type from a given identifier.
141   * Most identifiers have a URI protocol prefix or a specific structure that
142   * allows the guess.
143   *
144   * @return the inferred identifier type or Unknown if identifier is null or cant be inferred.
145   */
146  public static IdentifierType inferFrom(@Nullable String identifier) {
147    String lcIdentifier = StringUtils.trimToEmpty(identifier).toLowerCase();
148
149    if (lcIdentifier.isEmpty()) {
150      return UNKNOWN;
151    }
152
153    if (lcIdentifier.startsWith(org.gbif.api.model.common.DOI.GBIF_PREFIX)
154        || lcIdentifier.startsWith(org.gbif.api.model.common.DOI.TEST_PREFIX)) {
155      return DOI;
156    }
157
158    if (IdentifierUtils.isValidRNCColombiaIdentifier(lcIdentifier)) {
159      return RNC_COLOMBIA;
160    }
161
162    if (lcIdentifier.startsWith("10.")
163        || lcIdentifier.startsWith("doi:10.")
164        || lcIdentifier.startsWith("urn:doi:10.")
165        || lcIdentifier.startsWith("http://dx.doi.org/10.")
166        || lcIdentifier.startsWith("https://dx.doi.org/10.")
167        || lcIdentifier.startsWith("http://doi.org/10.")
168        || lcIdentifier.startsWith("https://doi.org/10.")) {
169      return DOI;
170    }
171
172    if (lcIdentifier.startsWith("https://ror.org")) {
173      return ROR;
174    }
175
176    if(IdentifierUtils.isValidWikidataIdentifier(lcIdentifier)) {
177      return WIKIDATA;
178    }
179
180    if (lcIdentifier.startsWith("http:")
181        || lcIdentifier.startsWith("https:")
182        || lcIdentifier.startsWith("www.")) {
183      return URL;
184    }
185    if (lcIdentifier.startsWith("ftp:")) {
186      return FTP;
187    }
188    if (lcIdentifier.startsWith("urn:lsid:") || lcIdentifier.startsWith("lsid:")) {
189      return LSID;
190    }
191
192    if (lcIdentifier.startsWith("urn:uuid:") || lcIdentifier.startsWith("uuid:")) {
193      return UUID;
194    }
195
196    if (lcIdentifier.startsWith("gbif:ih:irn:")) {
197      return IH_IRN;
198    }
199
200    if (lcIdentifier.startsWith("grid")) {
201      return GRID;
202    }
203
204    if (IdentifierUtils.isValidISILIdentifier(lcIdentifier)) {
205      return ISIL;
206    }
207
208   if (IdentifierUtils.isValidCLBDatasetKey(lcIdentifier)) {
209     return CLB_DATASET_KEY;
210   }
211
212    try {
213      //noinspection ResultOfMethodCallIgnored
214      java.util.UUID.fromString(lcIdentifier);
215      return UUID;
216    } catch (IllegalArgumentException ignored) {
217      // We're just trying to convert a String to anything readable. Apparently the UUID approach failed.
218    }
219
220    return UNKNOWN;
221  }
222}
